text: Patrick Stoddart (born 1944), is a British journalist, Media consultant and presenter who was the media editor and television critic of The Sunday Times. He attended Watford Grammar School for Boys and began his career in journalism with the Watford Observer. He then worked for the London Evening News. He has also presented television and radio programmes including The Media Show and has worked for ITV, Channel 4 and Radio 4. In 1992 he won a celebrity special edition of Fifteen to One.
